components.description: Pro Max alloy 3-finger with reach adjust
Pro Wheel alloy arm with 40 tooth steel chain ring and double chain guard
Bio Tuned Ergonomic Components dual density anatomical design
26" x 1.9" smooth rolling all weather Touring
ProMax Linear Pull Brakes(F), ProMax Linear Pull Brakes(R)
Alloy 60 degree with 180mm quill insertion and removable cap.
Schwinn 'N Gauged Hi-Ten New Comfort Tuned 68 Geometry, sloped top tube, Epicenter seat stays, rack and WB fittings. Low step over Women's.
Schwinn Comfort Tuned Super Soft elastomer memory foam
Alloy suspension with micro adjust head, pre-load adjust with 35mm travel
